name: One Night at Sister Location (Clickteam Edition)
name_original: One Night at Sister Location (Clickteam Edition)
description:
Is this a remaster? Well not really, I made the game completable and instead of Powerpoint I used Clickteam this time. The game has a story,I´ll try to make more than 1 game to set it.

If you want to download the original version, click here: https://gamejolt.com/games/onenightatsl/434175
